question: Chatting with a Muslim boy is allowed or not as we talk just general things?
answer:
QUESTION
Actually he is one of the member of an organization my friend know him and she asked to mail him and i did then we started chatting and now both of us love each other but i am just 17 yrs old and he is 25. he says u should just study i 'll do something but i don't know we r doing right or wrong plzz guide me right way?
ANSWER


Share:
It is not permissible for both of you to chat with one another. The
consequences of chatting, loving, etc. is the actual reason for the
prohibition.

If you do not stop now, the love could go much further. We have handled
innumerable cases where young boys and girls chat with one another and
thereafter engage in illicit relationships.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
